00016 /*-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017  * File:    mfgr.h
00018  * Purpose: header file for multi-file general raster information
00019  * Dependencies: 
00020  * Invokes:
00021  * Contents:
00022  * Structure definitions: 
00023  * Constant definitions: 
00024  *---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00025 
00026 /* avoid re-inclusion */
00027 #ifndef __MFGR_H
00028 #define __MFGR_H
00029 
00030 #include "H4api_adpt.h"
00031 
00032 /* Interlace types available */
00033 typedef int16 gr_interlace_t;
00034 #define MFGR_INTERLACE_PIXEL        0    /* pixel interlacing scheme */
00035 #define MFGR_INTERLACE_LINE         1    /* line interlacing scheme */
00036 #define MFGR_INTERLACE_COMPONENT    2    /* component interlacing scheme */
00037 
00038 #if defined MFGR_MASTER | defined MFGR_TESTER
00039 
00040 #include "hfile.h"
00041 #include "tbbt.h"       /* Get tbbt routines */
00042 
00043 /* This is the size of the hash tables used for GR & RI IDs */
00044 #define GRATOM_HASH_SIZE    32
00045 
00046 /* The tag of the attribute data */
00047 #define RI_TAG      DFTAG_VG    /* Current RI groups are stored in Vgroups */
00048 #define ATTR_TAG    DFTAG_VH    /* Current GR attributes are stored in VDatas */
00049 
00050 /* The default threshhold for attributes which will be cached */
00051 #define GR_ATTR_THRESHHOLD  2048    
00052 
00053 #define VALIDRIINDEX(i,gp) ((i)>=0 && (i)<(gp)->gr_count)
00054 
00055 /*
00056  * Each gr_info_t maintains 2 threaded-balanced-binary-tress: one of
00057  * raster images and one of global attributes
00058  */
00059 
00060 typedef struct gr_info {
00061     int32       hdf_file_id;    /* the corresponding HDF file ID (must be first in the structure) */
00062     uint16      gr_ref;         /* ref # of the Vgroup of the GR in the file */
00063 
00064     int32       gr_count;       /* # of image entries in gr_tab so far */
00065     TBBT_TREE  *grtree;         /* Root of image B-Tree */
00066     uintn       gr_modified;    /* whether any images have been modified */
00067 
00068     int32       gattr_count;    /* # of global attr entries in gr_tab so far */
00069     TBBT_TREE  *gattree;        /* Root of global attribute B-Tree */
00070     uintn       gattr_modified; /* whether any global attributes have been modified */
00071 
00072     intn        access;         /* the number of active pointers to this file's GRstuff */
00073     uint32      attr_cache;     /* the threshhold for the attribute sizes to cache */
00074 } gr_info_t;
00075 
00076 typedef struct at_info {
00077     int32 index;            /* index of the attribute (needs to be first in the struct) */
00078     int32 nt;               /* number type of the attribute */
00079     int32 len;              /* length/order of the attribute */
00080     uint16 ref;             /* ref of the attribute (stored in VData) */
00081     uintn data_modified;    /* flag to indicate whether the attribute data has been modified */
00082     uintn new_at;           /* flag to indicate whether the attribute was added to the Vgroup */
00083     char *name;             /* name of the attribute */
00084     void * data;             /* data for the attribute */
00085 } at_info_t;
00086 
00087 typedef struct dim_info {
00088     uint16  dim_ref;            /* reference # of the Dim record */
00089     int32   xdim,ydim,          /* dimensions of the image */
00090             ncomps,             /* number of components of each pixel in image */
00091             nt,                 /* number type of the components */
00092             file_nt_subclass;   /* number type subclass of data on disk */
00093     gr_interlace_t il;          /* interlace of the components (stored on disk) */
00094     uint16  nt_tag,nt_ref;      /* tag & ref of the number-type info */
00095     uint16  comp_tag,comp_ref;  /* tag & ref of the compression info */
00096 } dim_info_t;
00097 
00098 typedef struct ri_info {
00099     int32   index;              /* index of this image (needs to be first in the struct) */
00100     uint16  ri_ref;             /* ref # of the RI Vgroup */
00101     uint16  rig_ref;            /* ref # of the RIG group */
00102     gr_info_t *gr_ptr;          /* ptr to the GR info that this ri_info applies to */
00103     dim_info_t img_dim;         /* image dimension information */
00104     dim_info_t lut_dim;         /* palette dimension information */
00105     uint16  img_tag,img_ref;    /* tag & ref of the image data */
00106     int32   img_aid;            /* AID for the image data */
00107     intn    acc_perm;           /* Access permission (read/write) for image AID */
00108     uint16  lut_tag,lut_ref;    /* tag & ref of the palette data */
00109     gr_interlace_t im_il;       /* interlace of image when next read (default PIXEL) */
00110     gr_interlace_t lut_il;      /* interlace of LUT when next read */
00111     uintn data_modified;        /* whether the image or palette data has been modified */
00112     uintn meta_modified;        /* whether the image or palette meta-info has been modified */
00113     uintn attr_modified;        /* whether the attributes have been modified */
00114     char   *name;               /* name of the image */
00115     int32   lattr_count;        /* # of local attr entries in ri_info so far */
00116     TBBT_TREE *lattree;         /* Root of the local attribute B-Tree */
00117     intn access;                /* the number of times this image has been selected */
00118     uintn use_buf_drvr;         /* access to image needs to be through the buffered special element driver */
00119     uintn use_cr_drvr;          /* access to image needs to be through the compressed raster special element driver */
00120     uintn comp_img;             /* whether to compress image data */
00121     comp_coder_t comp_type;     /* compression type */
00122     comp_info cinfo;            /* compression information */
00123     uintn ext_img;              /* whether to make image data external */
00124     char *ext_name;             /* name of the external file */
00125     int32 ext_offset;           /* offset in the external file */
00126     uintn acc_img;              /* whether to make image data a different access type */
00127     uintn acc_type;             /* type of access-mode to get image data with */
00128     uintn fill_img;             /* whether to fill image, or just store fill value */
00129     void * fill_value;           /* pointer to the fill value (NULL means use default fill value of 0) */
00130     uintn store_fill;           /* whether to add fill value attribute or not */
00131     intn   name_generated;      /* whether the image has name that was given by app. or was generated by the library like the DFR8 images (added for hmap)*/
00132 } ri_info_t;
00133

00135 
00136 HDFLIBAPI intn GRIil_convert(const void * inbuf,gr_interlace_t inil,void * outbuf,
00137         gr_interlace_t outil,int32 dims[2],int32 ncomp,int32 nt);

00139 extern VOID GRIgrdestroynode(void * n);
00140 
00141 extern VOID GRIattrdestroynode(void * n);
00142 
00143 extern VOID GRIridestroynode(void * n);
00144 
00145 #endif /* MFGR_MASTER | MFGR_TESTER */
00146 
00147 #endif /* __MFGR_H */
